short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If nobody has blue, everyone has it. This extension makes Twitter blue gone for everyone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: There's a satisfying schadenfreude about seeing everyone get worked up over something that can be taken away so easily. Wield that power responsibly.
